THE LOCAL LOCKSMITH THAT YOU CAN TRUST

AUTHORIZED MEDECO DEALER • COMMERCIAL RESIDENTIAL • DOOR HARDWARE







ABOUT

COMMERCIAL, RESIDENTIAL, DAY OR NIGHT, YOUR TRUSTED LOCKSMITH IS JUST AROUND THE CORNER.


With 30 years of experience, K-Town Lock and Key has created a reputable name for itself as the trusted locksmith for locals. Working with hotels, realtors, and every in between, K-Town the 100% mobile company, specializes in installing new and existing locks, electronic access and set up, and installing door closers. When you call K-Town, high quality work is guaranteed.

SERVICES
WE ONLY USE THE BEST SUPPLIES AND LOCKS -
OUR WORK IS GUARANTEED.
COMMERCIAL

Experienced with hotels and medical facilities, and within tight budgets and timelines, our team is committed to deliver a service that meets the security and dependability commercial buildings require and taking your project to completion.

RESIDENTIAL

Your home is a safe place, and we are dedicated to playing our part to make sure that it remains protected, for you and your loved ones. With a wide array of decorative hardware to choose from, we can also help you meet both your functionality and aesthetic requirements.

DOOR HARDWARE

With expertise maintaining a wide selection of our doors, we can guarantee a solution for your door hardware and maintenance requirements from hanging doors to securing them too.

MEDECO DEALER

The best in the industry, we can supply all Medeco deadbolts and other Medeco products for all applications.
